name: Legend Quest
description:
ABSTRACT

We are making a 2D Role-playing game that contains lots of different kinds of user interactions, such as voice detection, noise detection, blow, speed detection, and so on. One of the most important interactions in the game is the voice-controlled interaction.

Control 

1. Use WASD to move around 

2. Press the i key to check your bag

3.  two ways to attack the enemies

  •  Left mouse button
  • Use the Microphone to Control, say "Fire" or "Fire Ball" to attack

4. When you see something with question marks (Except for candles), use the Microphone to Control, say "check" to get instruction

5. When you see some candles, use the Microphone to blow out the candles

6. When you see some sculptures, use the Microphone to control the sculptures the position

7. Press the Esc key to pause the panel, you also can see a widget on the left, which will tell you what level you are already finished

Note

1. When the game lasts too long, press the Esc key

2. In the last level of the game just only can use the Microphone to control
